distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for MozillaFirefox fixes the following issues: 

- update to Firefox 38.6.1 ESR (bsc#967087)
  * MFSA 2016-14/CVE-2016-1523
    (bmo#1246093)
    Vulnerabilities in Graphite 2
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The SillMap::readFace function in FeatureMap.cpp in Libgraphite in Graphite 2 1.2.4, as used in Mozilla Firefox before 43.0 and Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.6.1, mishandles a return value, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (missing initialization, NULL pointer dereference, and application crash) via a crafted Graphite smart font.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
